title: Which is the best Toplaner at this Season?
body:
Which is the best Toplaner this Season i have only bullshit Toplaner for this Season and I want to know which Champ I should buy. 
Thanks for your help!!!

replies.body:
I would say Sauerkraut, Lederhosen and Bratwurst are the best Toplaners in the moment!

NA and most EUW Players don't have those Champs cuz they're German Only Champions
i would say autobahn blitzkrieg and oktoberfest are good toplaner too
This is the german forum, thus use german language. So what was your question?
